word:
Backsliding in Health Reform. 

                                        Sanitarium, Cal., March 29, 1908. 

Elder A. G. Daniells, 
     Takoma Park Station, 
     Washington, D. C. 

Dear Brother:-- 


     I received your letter from Chicago, stating the need of a meeting-house in Takoma Park. It seems strange that the believers in Takoma Park have no suitable house of worship. I agree with you that provision should have been made for a good 


                               -427- 

meeting-house in view of the large number of our people who are living there.
